name: How To Open A Door: Retro Style
name_original: How To Open A Door: Retro Style
description:
INTRODUCTION:

A Fast Pace Platformer to challenge your skills and reflexes.
While having only one life you have to get by 10 whole levels of madness until you can save if a Player dies without saving, He will have to restart from the beginning.

For now, the game doesn't have a story, Your only objective is to collect the keys around the map in order to open the door to move to the next level.

CONTROLS:

  • If you are using a keyboard:
  1. Use the Left and Right arrow keys to move left and right.
  2. Use Space to jump.
  3. While in-game use Shift to go back to the main menu.
  • If you are using a gamepad:
  1. Use the Left and Right d-pad buttons or the left analogue to move left and right.
  2. If you are using a PlayStation controller use the X button to jump, if you are using an Xbox controller use the A button.
  3. While in-game If you are using a PlayStation controller use the CIRCLE button to go back to the main menu, if you are using an Xbox controller use the B button.

UPDATE 0.5.5:

  • added a debug mode:
    -Press 4 and 6 at the same time in the main menu to activate the debug mode.
    -If you are using a controller press both of the analogue buttons L3 and R3.
    -In-game you won't take any damage
    -If you press 4 or L3 you can go back to the previous level
    -If you press 6 or R3 you can go to the next level.
  • Added Level 5, 6 and 7.
  • Updated Player and Enemy Sprites and animations.
  • Updated Door Sprite.
  • Added A Turret.
